channel.title: Yell Colors
channel.description: Hello All, I posted this in the server help section but they said I should try here. I tried adding some yell colors to my yell system and whenever someone try's to do the command, it shows this. <#FF0000>[Owner] Me: Hello Instead of showing the color. How do I add that in my client so it recognizes the color and uses it. Or is there a list of colors that I could use instead of those like a list that has these colors on it? @blu@, @red@, @dre@, etc.

item.title: Yell Colors
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:425457”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=528121.msg3850923#msg3850923 date=1324002268]
You can’t use html colors in the runescape client lol. That’s a custom edit people do.
[/quote]

in 459+ jagex added such a system, stewie ported it to 317, look on r-s for the tutorial[/quote]

Could just add more colors to the bitmap font class, no need for RGB notation.

Read full topic

You can’t use html colors in the runescape client lol. That’s a custom edit people do.
[/quote]

in 459+ jagex added such a system, stewie ported it to 317, look on r-s for the tutorial[/quote]
Alright thanks, that explains exactly why I didn’t know. I never broke past 377.

item.title: Yell Colors
item.dc:creator: @JustChillBro JustChillBro
item.description:
@JustChillBro wrote:

Hello All,
I posted this in the server help section but they said I should try here.
I tried adding some yell colors to my yell system and whenever someone try’s to do the command, it shows this.
<#FF0000>[Owner] Me: Hello
Instead of showing the color.
How do I add that in my client so it recognizes the color and uses it.
Or is there a list of colors that I could use instead of those like a list that has these colors on it? @blu@, @red@, @dre@, etc.

Read full topic
